definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Some wigs were so large they covered a man's shoulders or back.
sentences.chinese: 一些假发肥差大，一直盖到肩部或背部。

sentences.english: Mr. Wilson got a well-paid easy job just because of his bright red hair.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊先生因一头火红的头发而得到一份肥差。

definition: to send/to assign/to appoint/servants of an official/official messenger
official post/billet/commission/CL:件[jian4]/see also 差事[chai1 shi5]
(coll.) to gain profit (usu. by underhand means)
hard task/difficult mission/arduous and unrewarding undertaking/drudgery/grind/chore
lit. to eat from government coffers/to serve as a government employee/to live off government money
to use social connections/to toady to influential people
